title: Apparel and Accessories Now Available
content: We have exciting news! The purple HOC Shirts, the Toronto 2018 Ball Cap, and the Toronto 2018 Lapel Pin are now available!
You are now able to get your very own piece of Toronto 2018 history. Be sure to get your selection through our Toronto 2018 Shop where you can purchase the shirts and accessories.

If you are already registered for Toronto 2018 and have agreed to receive announcements and updates regarding the convention, you will be receiving notifications about any news regarding Toronto 2018.
Also, come back often to this website to check for exciting news and updates.
